reviews.review: Jeu super sympa a jouer entre potes. Quelques problèmes avec d'autre joueurs de temps en temps mais il ne faut pas s'énerver et tout se passera bien

Game is fun to play with friends, and has a very scary feel to it.

Can be frustrating sometimes because the devs still haven't implemented actual servers.
There is tons of potential for this game, i.e cross platform.

super fun to play with friends.

Desesperante,  las mecánicas del juego, la actitud de los jugadores, las actualizaciones con fallos, el precio de los artículos cosméticos, el hitbox favorable del killer, etc.... 
Es muy adictivo y me gusta mucho el no-competitivo y casual del juego, pero te va a desesperar, como a todo el mundo.

Funny game if you play survivor, funny game if you play killer until you get to rank 1 where you will want to uninstall. (even on rank 15)
Game is not balanced, if survivors are good, you can be god killer you won't make more than 1 kill.
You can play this game for "fun", but don't take it seriosly.

18-11-2020
This game is still broken imbalanced, maybe even more than ever. Don't buy to play killer, if you play survivor is funny, killer no.

16-09-2021
I started play again. Is even worse now, my main killer got nerfed. I just played with iriscindent hatch and pink addon and i got 1 hatch. Mori is useless, is like you dont have it. And people gets free escape with keys, i can continue write infinitely...game trash as always because is balanced bad.

05/12/2021
In the history of DBD killers never were so weak, killers are clowns now. You have no chance to win at high mmr, only if they mess around and fuck them up. Play killer is a nightmare, survivor is a joke. Same thing again and again.
I love this game, i love it and i recommend it!

Tengo que admitir que al inicio lo odie... a veces morir tantas veces jugando contra asesinos (que valla que son algunos despiadados) pero es la naturaleza del juego. Con forme aprendes a tomar el juego como si de verdad tuvieras que escapar de un asesino real valla que te atrapa. Llega un punto que huir es bastante emocionante y la adrenalina sube a tope cuando el asesino asoma y por muy poco no te ve y huyes! Yo lo recomiendo :)
Топ игра за свои деньги берите советую
the game is perfectly what it sould beside the hitboxes
The devs really keep up with updates on this game and listen to the community. I play it on pc,ps4, and nintendo switch.

Please God just stay as far away from this game as possible.

Edit: Almost 2 years since I made my last review, opinion still stands lol.
Wonderful game, lots of fun, but lots of glitches. Requires really good graphics card.
great game, could do with some updates maybe playing with your friends online and bigger groups more killers etc but great game overall

Jogo tem pontos fortes e fracos como qualquer outro, porém há algumas coisas que realmente incomodam como o fato de killers serem muito desbalanceados, alguns cenários serem praticamente impossíveis de se completar em low ranking pois são estreitos demais e com muitos artifícios a favor dos killers que alguns já são ridiculos de fortes, e a grande maioria das pessoas jogarem por missões e não com intuido de realmente vencer o jogo, mas se conseguir superar essas dificuldades e detalhes irritantes é um jogo bastante divertido.
das spiel macht sehr viel spaß
I KILL PEOPLE AND THEN PEOPLE KILL ME

great game if you learn fast.
also customizing your characters takes time but its worth it in the end.
(btw level up meg and learn how to use all of her perks, shes a perfect survivor to learn off of. If you really want to put money into the game buy Spark of Madness that includes Feng Min and the Doctor. Feng has super new-player-friendly perks that you'll like as much as meg's.)

Советую всем, кто любит фильмы про маньяков, здесь вы сможете почувствовать себя тем, кто убегает от него или же здесь вы можете сами опробовать себя в роли маньяка! Вещь крутая всем советую! 
Но также хочу зафиксировать внимание на одном - если у вас достаточно долго (5-10 минут) будет искать матч за мана (за маньяка) или за выжившего, то вам остаётся только ждать, потому что, как я понимаю, у всех такая фигня происходит...
Игра очень клевая, кучу киллеров из разных фильмов: Saw, stranger things, ghost face вообщем крутая игра, всем советую!
es muy bueno descargenlo sepan jugar y les va a encantar

There are basically three drawbacks to this game for potential buyers depending on who you are. One thing that definitely is a large part of this game, and the reason more of my friends don't play this game with me is the built in quick time event known as "skill checks". You can see that in literally any survivor game play video if you need further understanding, but they are a huge part of the game, and aren't really that bad to me, since they're pretty easy. The second thing is that because this is an online game, people are toxic. Very, very toxic. Others are nice, but those are rare in every game now. The third thing I would say is a drawback to this game is that if you're new to playing killer, you're in for a rough time finding matches. The rank system is 1-20, 1 being the best, 20 being where you start. If you fall between ranks 12-20, it's gonna be a good 15-20 minutes for you to get a match. Other than that, I find this game to be very enjoyable, and very satisfying based on how you perform. I personally play both survivor and killer, and I can enjoy the game either way.
Hace mucho no encontraba un juego que enganchara tanto como este..
good, very good game    but an update to polish the graphics would be great

Я вспомнил почему удалял это несколько лет назад. Тогда не было ни баланса, ни оптимизации, ни интересных ивентов. из всех тех проблем исправили все, кроме баланса. с удовольствием удаляю эту парашу снова

Эту игру очень сильно испортили, разрабы прям работали над тем, что бы сделать ее еще дерьмовее. Получилась, естественно, полная параша. Наделали дохуя скинов, зарабатывают бабаки, молодцы, уважаю) Нюрсу убили, механику игры убили, говно короче. Начал играть в это дерьмо больше 2 лет назад, суммарно где то 3 к часов на 2 аккаунтах. Я просто знаю о чем говорю. БДБ стала полной парашей, не как дота, конечно, но близко.
